metadata.title: CVE-2021-40114 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple Cisco products are affected by a vulnerability in the way theSnort detection engine processes ICMP traffic that could allow anunauthenticated, remote attacker to cause a denial of service (DoS)condition on an affected device. The vulnerability is due to impropermemory resource management while the Snort detection engine is processingICMP packets. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending aseries of ICMP packets through an affected device. A successful exploitcould allow the attacker to exhaust resources on the affected device,causing the device to reload.

criterions.comment: snort package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
